TopicTitle: Nuka Corp shuttle project ( and apparently other stuff :D )

Articles.Content:
That heatshield looks great in my opinion.

You should still be able to export using the .15 tools, you just can\'t add ladders and hatches.
Ooo ....I\'m liking the looks of this. I would be fantastic to see some shuttle\'s integrated into KSP. This could be especially interesting when you missions and currency are adde.

Awesome! I had a crazy idea:

What if you put a MechJeb module and Crew tank and put it on the Dragonfly instead of a capsule, then crammed it into the big shuttle? Would it work?
Has the dragon fly been release at all. Or is it still under construction....?
You owe me a plenetary exploration Rescue pod by 0.17, Looks like IM GOING TO EVE IN 0.17 WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT
any updates my friend?

any updates my friend?

Naa been to harsh on my body lately. Been up 2 or 3 days at a time. And now my body is doing some payback. Everytime I try to work on something I do not have any energy to do it. Will continue when I can again.

Have restarted the minishuttle.

Added a little more siency to it It is designed to have a forward speed of max mach 3 or ca. 1000m/s So when entering the atmo. You need to keep the angle of 40 degree until the speed comes down enough to transition to forward flight.

Was thinking of mach 5. Though then it needed to be alot longer to do that. So I chose mach 3 instead.
missed you man... release finally one of those shuttles XD
Hmm, That the new model, Looks pretty sweet.

Naa been to harsh on my body lately. Been up 2 or 3 days at a time. And now my body is doing some payback. Everytime I try to work on something I do not have any energy to do it. Will continue when I can again.

Not good.. sleep man, sleep!

I myself have a throat infection for the past 3 days with fever and that sort of stuff

And about the Shuttle.. Looks P-R-E-T-T-Y good

(Althought with this formfactor is a tailfin more aesthetically pleasing?)

Not good.. sleep man, sleep!

I myself have a throat infection for the past 3 days with fever and that sort of stuff

And about the Shuttle.. Looks P-R-E-T-T-Y good

(Althought with this formfactor is a tailfin more aesthetically pleasing?)

Been sleeping a lot so feel better. And hope you will get better.

The Problem with using a tailfin on the shuttles, is that It will be really long because it have to be inside the sound barrier cone. So the easiest solution is to put it on the wings.

And now been thinking about the projects. And maybe come up with something better. At least It is all my project in one kinda thing

It is a 3 kerbal shuttle mounted on the lander it self. And the landers main purpose is to transport modules to the surface of Mun or Minmus. Thinking of using the same system that Pablock is using for the crewable empty pods, for the Mun/Minmus base. So it will be possible to transport kerbals to the base where they can be inside the base it self. But that will be in the future.

Couple of questions:

- How big are these craft gonna be in relation to the other parts.

- How many will there be on release (like for instance space for 1 kerbal, or space for 3 kerbals being diffrent types)?

- Are these supposed to be assembled by the player or are they one piece parts like the cockpits in KSP.

- Are they supposed to be launched from the runway or the launchtower?

- It's looking mighty fine , release date?
Am I the only person who thinks the OP pics of the shuttle look like a B-2 stealth bomber? =D

I have 2 questions

1.where can i download your addons?

2.can you send me a model of kerbal guy?

YOU ARE AWESOME !

Superb work Anariaq!
Oh how you tease us Anariaq...

OMG Anariaq! You're simply awesome !!! I just look at all what you posted on this thread and I'm amazed ! You're definitely not an beginner at modelling way far from that...more like a Master modeler XD. Do you have a team? Someone to test\balance your mod? If you want someone that is often available to test out your mod I'm here x) I know how to balance object I have two computer (a powerful one and a casual gamer one) and I really like testing. If you want to know more about me just pm me ;D It would really be an honor
This might be a stupid question, but what is the attachment on the back of that shuttle supposed to be?
I would say the command pod of the lander. The same windowshape can be found on a previous shuttle and on the previous lander (was it called the firefly?).

I've said it before: Anariaq, your designs are simply astounding. If only you would go further than just the design and realise a real addition to KSP. So far, you've designed things that really make the viewers of your design drool. Yet, none of them have ever gone beyond the render images. Frankly, i'm wondering if this thread wouldn't be better situated in the "Art" section instead of the "Add-on development".

Will agree with TheCardinal.

I will not post any update til I have anything that is needed beta tested. So no update on this post until I have something for you guys.

The last post with something under development without any beta test model.

This one is replacement of Korion. Will have room for 4 kerbals.

Next post will have something to beta test.
